laboratory_examinations.findings: Demonstrated left hemisphere dominance for language.
Showed a third recurrence of the mass.

laboratory_examinations.date: After resection of the third recurrence
laboratory_examinations.findings: Tumor had a proliferative fraction of 50%.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased from 1% to 2% following the first resection to 50% after the third resection.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated choline/creatinine ratio indicative of malignant transformation.
